definitions.definition: ( informal ) Of a person, chatting a lot or fond of chatting.
( informal ) Of a text or speech, expressed in a conversational style.
( computing ) Supplying more information than necessary; verbose .
examples: Chatty error messages may help attackers to compromise your server.

main_definition: ( informal ) Of a person, chatting a lot or fond of chatting.
secondary_definitions: ( informal ) Of a text or speech, expressed in a conversational style.
( computing ) Supplying more information than necessary; verbose .

definitions.definition: Infested with lice ; or, ( figuratively ) dirty, worn or of poor quality; lousy .
definitions.label_groups: British , Australia , New Zealand , dated or dialect

main_definition: ( British , Australia , New Zealand , dated or dialect ) Infested with lice ; or, ( figuratively ) dirty, worn or of poor quality; lousy .
